description: Establishes interactions between questions and answer options for a submission.
label: Create Submission Interactions

options.name: submissionToken
options.label: Submission token
options.info: The Submission token for which you want to create the sections

options.name: answerOptions
options.label: Answer Options
options.info: The Answer Options created in the previous step

options.name: questions
options.label: Questions
options.info: The Questions created in the previous step

options.name: log
options.label: Log this action
options.info: The log of the creation of the submission in the application logs
